content: स्वप् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्वपिति, सुप्त; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} सुष्यते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} सुषुप्सति) (rarely {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> स्वपति-ते) {@--1@} To sleep, fall asleep, go to sleep; असंजातकिणस्कंधः सुखं स्वपिति गौर्गडिः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; इतः स्वपिति केशवः <ls>Bh. 2. 76.</ls> {@--2@} To recline, repose, lie down, rest. {@--3@} To be absorbed in; <ls>Bv. 4. 19.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्वापयति-ते) To cause to sleep, rock to sleep. --WITH अव, --नि, प्र, or सं to sleep, lie down; प्रसुप्तलक्षणः <ls>Māl. 7</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2 42</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 44.</ls>
